channel.title: Setitem help please!
channel.description:
someones hacking phats on my serv and he said it was a problem with my setitem?? how do I fix it
PLEASE HELP

item.title: Setitem help please!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Those are the to commands i was looking for

disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName);

well heres an easier way just add this code to your cracker.

Search for

if (CrackerID == 962) {
Then under that add this

disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName);
Since you did that now search for

if(itemUseID == 962) {
Again and then add

disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName);
that again.
That would make sure that they cant crack crackers for p hats
This way would be more efficent because with that way they could just type it in and then rejoin becuase it’s saved to their client so they could just log in and get money and boom it would be crackers then they just keep on cracking.

Read full topic

item.title: Setitem help please!

item.description:

make a void called cheat or something or just make something like this

if (command.startswith("setitem")) { string name = (command.substring(8)) appendToBanned = PlayerHandler(getplayername) }

item.title: Setitem help please!
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

add this to ur clinet.java

if (command.startsWith(“setitem”)) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::setitem");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Auto-Ban did hes job … !”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}
